raw.question: Keep strict pre-registration failure behavior; only clean up duplicated retry wording
raw.chosen: Keep strict pre-registration failure behavior; only clean up duplicated retry wording
raw.reasoning: Rate limit is a real Relaycast API constraint and should remain explicit; duplicated wording was noisy and misleading
